How many people are affected by nonbullous congenital ichthyosiform erythroderma ?,"NBCIE is estimated to affect 1 in 200,000 to 300,000 individuals in the United States. This condition is more common in Norway, where an estimated 1 in 90,000 people are affected.",GHR,nonbullous congenital ichthyosiform erythroderma
